description: A React functional component named Timer that displays a label and remaining time in minutes and seconds, with configurable styling and accessibility labels.

methods.name: Timer({ label, seconds, color = 'var(--color-primary)', ariaLabel })
methods.description: React component rendering a timer with label and remaining seconds, formatted as MM:SS.

ctags.name: Timer
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Timer({ label, seconds, color = 'var(--color-primary)', ariaLabel }) {$/
